name: Hanna S'kiyah
content:
Hanna S'kiyah was a female Twi'lek who lived on Naboo during the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, her sister was kidnapped by the Naboo pirates and kept prisoner for ransom. Although the pirates used to capture wealthy Naboo noble, Hanna S'kiyah did not have enough money to pay a ransom. In 1 ABY, she met a spacer near the Royal Palace in Theed and begged the spacer to rescue her sister. Hanna S'kiyah provided the location of the Pirate Bunker and hoped the spacer could be successful.
Hanna S'kiyah was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Hanna S'kiyah was added to the game with the "Publish 1" update, released on August 3, 2003.
